column1: #Text=Bumi says : " Looks pretty good to me . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " Is it too late for you to unretire from the United Forces ? "
#Text=Bumi says : " The paperwork 's gone through , little brother .
#Text=Hopefully our visit to all the air temples will give you the inspiration you need to look more deeply into your studies .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Can we see where Grandpa Aang was born ?
#Text=" Meelo says : " How many lemurs can I have ?
#Text=" Ikki says : " I wan na get tattoos !
#Text=But instead of arrows , I want lightning bolts !
#Text=" Jinora says : " You ca n't get lightning bolts .
#Text=" Ikki says : " You do n't make any sense !
